title: Data Science Master's Program
content: The Master of Science in Data Science combines computer science, statistics, and domain expertise to prepare students for careers in data analytics, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. The curriculum covers data mining, visualization, statistical modeling, and big data technologies.

title: Cybersecurity Graduate Certificate
content: This graduate certificate program provides advanced training in network security, cryptography, secure software development, and digital forensics. Ideal for working professionals looking to specialize in information security.

title: International Student Admissions
content: International students are welcomed at Northeastern University. Requirements include TOEFL or IELTS scores, financial documentation, and all standard application materials. The university provides comprehensive support services for international students including visa assistance and cultural orientation.

title: Husky Card Services
content: The Husky Card is the official ID card for Northeastern University students, faculty, and staff. It provides access to buildings, library services, dining plans, and serves as a debit card for on-campus purchases. Cards can be obtained at the Curry Student Center.

title: Athletics and Recreation
content: Northeastern University competes in NCAA Division I athletics as part of the Colonial Athletic Association. The Cabot Center and Marino Recreation Center offer state-of-the-art fitness facilities, intramural sports, and club sports programs for all students.
